Name: Oyster Bay
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of skewered Fragata Green Olive .
Review: Citrus notes and dry vermouth subtly influence Scotch whisky in this refined cocktail.
History: Named after Oyster Bay, Long Island. Famous for being the location of Sagamore Hill, US President Theodore Roosevelt's summer White House.
Nutrition: One serving of Oyster Bay contains 177 calories
